DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess safety and efficacy of AEB071 combined with everolimus in a CNI-free (calcineurin inhibitor) regimen in renal transplant recipients.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of AEB071 Versus Cyclosporine in de Novo Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patient has been maintained on study drug for 12 months in the core study Exclusion criteria: Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
